EmailTemplate.subject: An exciting update for Ecole L'Union!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Yesterday was a very exciting day for #LoveLegacy. Benjamin Cole Brown’s parents were on hand to see the very first lunch being provided to our students out of the school’s new kitchen and our goal, as #LoveLegacy support continues to grow, is to expand this nutrition program to every day the students are in school. Nutrition plays a massive role in the growth and development of children and we’re extremely excited to see friends and family of Live Different helping to make this a reality.
Live Different is grateful for your support, as it truly is making a huge difference in the lives of the students and the community. Another way you can help is to share #LoveLegacy with friends and family who might be interested in getting involved. Together, we can help Benjamin Cole Brown’s dreams for these children be realized.
Ashley Smart Director of Marketing and Media Live Different
The night is long, but our dreams are longer. -Haitian Proverb
